relation: I want to major in dance. It is very hard to find a Christian college with that major that isn't extremely expensive or hard to get into. It's not cheap, but it's better!

I know there is a mall, I think it's called Renaissance at colony park, that is very nice, about a 15 minute drive. There are some excellent restaurants in that area! So if you like shopping, lucky you, but beware it is pricy. I also went to a movie theatre, maybe about 10 minutes, while I was at Belhaven. Plus, you're in Jackson, there is plenty to find to do when you're bored!
It's ok, not as good as home cooking, but that's given since it is a college.
nice dorms, from my stay over the summer the girls in Caldwell said there were cockroaches, but I don't know for sure. The showers are awesome.
From what my friends have told me, academics are great, keep up on your work.
keep in touch with your admissions counselor with any questions you have. Also, get in touch with the head of the department you want to major in, learn about their requirements and such.
Belhaven has a beautiful campus. You can feel the seriousness and sincerity when you are on campus. Everyone I have met from there are very friendly, helpful, and kind.
